title: Richbased
author: Richbased
content: There are some of us that were introduced into this forum by either a friend, a relative or a family friend and after introducing us to this platform we were left at our own fate without any advice or guidelines on how to navigate through the forum but yet we stood determined to succeed and we starting learning by ourselves, getting helps and information from people in this forum, Google, and YouTube and as time goes on we became accustomed to how almost everything is working now and it looked as if we never had a difficult beginning. I urge and encourage everyone that feel left alone or abandoned when they were introduced to this platform and I tell you that no knowledge is easier to acquire than the knowledge you sort for yourself rather than relying on others to be your road map. Every little beginning has a greater ending as all you need is to be focused and sort to learn more and say less as those are the channel to arriving your destination.

comments.author: Samlucky O
comments.body: Op wetting you talk na true Sha. But one thing you sopos no be say " pikin wey Dem carry for back no no say journey far" sometimes e good make the pikin Waka on em own sothat e go understand many things on em own because the best teacher na yours self. Wetting you go do na just to thank God say somebody bring you to this life transformation center. As for me wether them leave me for road o or not I appreciate God, I just thank God for this place. Introducing me here alone is worthy of testimony. I have been praying for God to see me through and I believe he has answered glory be to God. In any situation we give thanks to God. As I they praise his Holy name, so shall he fufil his word in my life Amen.Then as for those people wey them bring here wey still they depend on person wey bring you here, stop to dey think say them bring you here come leave you. comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Life no easy and at some point you might fit feels discouraged to further due to the difficulty you may find along your success line and if you are not determined to break the even or odds then one will be forever remained in their current situation without any solution I could remembered back in the days when I was just helped to come here after which DYOR was my second name. Even as that I never hope and still depending on the person to get me tea and bread in the morning rather I decided to take a step further than the way I was told but today after every it seems like people don't pass through stress or hard time over here, Yes it looks so simple because you have developed yourself to make research and get the necessary information instead of relying on your sponsor or someone who gets you here.My dear it's wasn't easy to start without knowing what to do and where to start from I say kudos to people who started without any guidance or proper orientation and sanitation on how the forum functions.

comments.body: OP, cheers to this set of person as e no easy, una well done and una don try to learn the ways of the forum. Normally our people go talk am say "You fit carry Horse or Donkey go river but you no go fit force am to drink water" as dey introduce you come here make u no forget say u no been dey alone because definitely many persons here including this our oga dem and many others follow welcome you still dey share some kind thoughts and discussion na so person take dey grow for here, make we remember say "No man is an Island" we all need ourselves to keep progress in these our Bitcoin journey. And e good say u sef discipline your self as many don come but dey no fit survive due to mischievous behavior but u come spend more of ur time to understand everything inside here, one's again cheers to you OP.

comments.author: Justbillywitt
comments.body: A determined heart will always succeed despite the obstacles that will confront us. Those that makes exploit in life has at one point been abandoned to their own fate. One thing I have observed in life is when you feel like giving up that is when the breakthrough is about to come if you put one more effort. I can still remember when I came in here I was left alone as everything seems very strange to me. I read several posts and it was as if nothing was happening. But one thing kept encouraging me and that is those who are doing it did they have two heads? So I vowed never to give up.

comments.author: Y3shot
comments.body: The forum is not hard for those who are ready to spend time to learn, everything one needs to understand is in the forum.  Every board in the forum as rules and regulations,  the first thread pinned. If you go through the rules of the forum you have everything that can make you to survive in the forum but some people finds it difficult to spend time to read, they just need short cuts to gain from the forum without making efforts to help themselves survive the forum.

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: Really there is nothing to cheers about, and many people here in the forum actually had no guardians, I don't think you need to be bottle feed because you are a New members of the forum, the forum already had laid the plans to integrate newcomers into the forum, that's why in the meta section of the forum you have the rules and regulations, frequently asked questions, and forum ranks, positions e.t.c, in addition to that there is a board dedicated to beginners and helping people out, you don't have to be Isaac Newton to understand this forum.
